title: Prompt #1 - Tech Presentation
description: Explain a complex technical concept to a non-technical audience.
ai_feedback_guide: Prioritize clarity and analogies that aid understanding.

title: Prompt #2 - Startup Story
description: Tell the story of how your idea evolved into a project or prototype.
ai_feedback_guide: Emphasize evolution, motivation, and iteration.

description: Tell the story of how your idea evolved into a project or prototype.

title: Prompt #5 - Teamwork Scenario
description: Describe a group project and how you contributed to its success.
ai_feedback_guide: Highlight role, collaboration, and outcomes.

title: Prompt #6 - Interview
description: Describe a time you faced a difficult challenge in your career.
ai_feedback_guide: Encourage honesty and thoughtful reflection. Look for insights and learning.

title: Prompt #7 - Product Pitch
description: Pitch a product you believe will change the industry.
ai_feedback_guide: Focus on market need, uniqueness, and delivery.
